original_text: From the time when he turned away from the Lord they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem, and he fled to Lachish. But they sent after him to Lachish and put him to death there.
korean_text: 아마샤가 돌아서서 여호와를 버린 후로부터 예루살렘에서 무리가 그를 반역하였으므로 그가 라기스로 도망하였더니 반역한 무리가 사람을 라기스로 따라 보내어 그를 거기서 죽이게 하고

sentences.original_text: From the time when he turned away from the Lord
they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 예루살렘에서 그를 대항하여 음모를 꾸몄다

sentences.original_text: But they sent after him to Lachish
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 그를 라기스로 뒤쫓아 보냈다

sentences.original_text: and put him to death there
